Verify the header 'Username' has font weight 700, color #333333, and is aligned 'left'
Verify the first user 'John Doe' is aligned 'left', has padding 8px, and border-bottom 1px solid #eee
Verify the 'Status' column displays 'Active' in green #28a745 for enabled users
Verify the 'Status' column displays 'Inactive' in gray #6c757d for disabled users
Verify the pagination 'Next' button is enabled, has border radius 4px, and bottom margin 20px
Verify the 'Edit' button has aria-label 'Edit User Profile' and its x coordinate is 1000px
Verify when the 'Confirm Deletion' modal dialog appears, its background overlay has opacity 0.7 and background color rgba(0,0,0,0.7)
Verify the modal title 'Delete Item?' has font size 24px and color #333333
Verify the content text 'Are you sure you want to delete this item?' has font family 'Open Sans' and text align 'center'
Verify the 'Cancel' button is visible, has border 1px solid #ccc, and is positioned at x=300px
Verify the 'Delete' button has background color #dc3545, font weight 600, and its y coordinate is 200px
Verify the modal has width 400px and height 250px
Verify on the user profile page, the 'Username' field's label is 'Username' with font size 14px
Verify the 'Email' input field is disabled, has value 'user@domain.com', and background color #f2f2f2
Verify the 'Update Profile' button has background color #007bff, color #ffffff, padding 10px 20px, and border radius 5px
Verify the profile picture is loaded, has source 'profile_pic.jpg', rendered dimensions 100x100px, and its shape is 'circle'
Verify the 'Join Date' text displays the date '2023-01-15' with font weight 500
Verify when the image carousel is loaded, the first image has source 'slide1.jpg', rendered dimensions 900x400px, and is visible
Verify the navigation dots below the carousel are 3 in count, each 10px in diameter, and the active dot has background color #007bff
Verify the 'Next' arrow button is enabled, has aria-label 'Next Slide', and its x coordinate is 880px
Wait 5 seconds
Verify the carousel auto-advances to the second image, and the transition takes 800ms
Verify the alt text for the active slide is 'Scenic Landscape'
Verify on the date picker component, the current month 'October' is displayed with font size 20px and font weight 600
Verify the selected date '15' has background color #007bff, color #ffffff, and border radius 50%
Verify today's date '26' (if not '15') has border 1px solid #007bff
Verify the 'Next Month' button is enabled, has width 30px, and aria-label 'Go to next month'
Verify the entire date picker widget has width 280px and height 300px
Verify the date picker header background color is #f0f0f0
Open the chat widget
Verify the chat window is visible, fixed to the bottom-right at x=calc(100vw - 320px) and y=calc(100vh - 420px), with width 300px and height 400px
Verify the 'Type a message...' input field has placeholder 'Type a message...' and border-top 1px solid #eee
Verify the 'Send' button has background color #007bff, color #ffffff, and font size 14px
Verify the message area automatically scrolls to the bottom (scroll-top is max) when a new message appears
Verify the chat header has text 'Support Chat' and background color #007bff
Verify on the 'Pricing Plans' page, the 'Basic' plan accordion header has background color #f0f0f0, font weight 600, and padding 15px
Click the 'Basic' plan accordion header
Verify its content panel becomes visible, transitioning its height over 300ms, and its border-left is 5px solid #007bff
Verify the 'Premium' plan's content is initially hidden
Verify the 'Features' list items have font size 15px and color #555555
Verify the overall width of the accordion section is 700px
Verify the 'Learn More' button's label is 'Learn More' and its right padding is 20px
Verify during page load, the loading spinner is visible, has width 50px, height 50px, and is centered (x=calc(50vw - 25px), y=calc(50vh - 25px))
Verify the spinner uses an animation named 'spin' that completes a full rotation every 1s
Verify the spinner's border color is rgba(0,0,0,0.2) for 3 sides and #007bff for the top border, with border width 5px
Wait 2 seconds
Verify the spinner becomes hidden, and its opacity transitions to 0 over 200ms
Verify the background behind the spinner is transparent
Trigger a new notification

Verify the toast automatically disappears after 5 seconds, with an opacity transition to 0 over 500ms

Verify the map markers count is 5, and each marker has a 'pin.svg' source image

Verify the map controls are located at x=10px, y=10px
